name: The CGMA Lads - The One Eyed Dragon
name_original: The CGMA Lads - The One Eyed Dragon
description:
A game about a one-eyed dragon who has to traverse an inhospitable land plagued by knights and slimes while dealing with his lack of depth-perception.

(One of the jumps is a bit difficult. Make sure to hold the spacebar when jumping)

The aim of the game is to complete the level by platforming and changing the camera angle with Q and E buttons to change your perspective on the scene. Without depth perception, getting from A to B is a challenge.
